arguments.description:
type of the color map, possible values are:
		- spectrum: A colormap with the colors of the spectrum
		- linear: A colormap which interpolates linearly between two colors
		- grayscale: A grayscale colormap. Black is 0, white is 1
arguments.name: type

arguments.description: used only for type "linear", the color corresponding to value 0 in the colormap.
arguments.name: lineColor1

arguments.description: used only for type "linear", the color corresponding to value 1 in the colormap.
arguments.name: lineColor2

description: These are passed to the function ImageFilters (see ImageFilter documentation) which convert gray values to colors.
name: imagefiltercolormap
